champ.champInfo:
The general management of the organization and conduct of competitions is carried out by the Department of Youth and Sports of the executive body of the Kyiv City Council (Kyiv City State Administration) (hereinafter - the Department) and the Separate Unit of the NGO "National Kyokushinkai Karate Federation of Ukraine" (hereinafter - the Separate Unit). The responsibility for the preparation and direct conduct of the competition rests with the main panel of judges formed by the Separate Unit The main judge of the competition: - judge of the international category Serhiy Bronistovsky, 5th dan (Kyiv). Secretary of the competition — Tryfonov Vladyslav Anatoliyovych, judge of the II category (Kyiv)

The competition will be held on June 17, 2023. Venue – Track and field arena, Kyiv, street; Pavla Tychyna, 18

Preliminary applications for participation in the competition must be sent by June 10, 2023 (inclusive) to the address: e-mail: tatarchenkoiu@ukr.net phone numbers for previous applications: Ihor Tatarchenko - 067 788 77 28;

Program

June 17, 2023

  • 07:30 - 08:30 registration and weighing of athletes
  • 08:30 – 09:00 meeting of judges, formation of judging teams
  • 09:00 – 13:00 Competition among younger boys/girls, boys/girls on 3 courts (2015-2016; 2013-2014; 2011-2012; 2009-2010)
  • 13:00 - 14:00 Lunch break
  • 14:00 – 14:30 Awarding of champions and prize-winners among younger boys

Competition participants

Athletes from kyokushinkai karate sports clubs of Kyiv and the regions are allowed to participate in the competition.Competitions are allowed, provided that at least 4 athletes in each sport discipline (weight category) will participate in sports competitions

Athletes in age groups take part in the competition:

  • younger boys (second group) (born in 2015-2016), sports qualification at least III junior. grade
  • younger boys (second group) (born in 2013-2014), sports qualification at least III junior. grade
  • younger boys (third group) (born in 2011-2012), sports qualification at least III junior. grade
  • younger boys (third group) (born in 2009-2010), sports qualification at least III junior. grade
  • young men (born in 2007-2008), sports qualification at least II junior. grade
  • juniors (born in 2005-2006), sports qualification of at least II class
  • adults, sports qualification of at least II class

Categories KUMITE men

  • 2015-2016: -20; -25; -30; -35; -40; 40+
  • 2013-2014: -25; -30; -35; -40; -45; 45+
  • 2011-2012: -30; -35; -40; -45; -50; 50+
  • 2009-2010: -35; -40; -45; -50; -55; 55+
  • 2007-2008: -40; -45; -50; -55; -60; -65; 65+
  • 2005-2006: -50; -55; -60; -65; -70; -75; 75+
  • MEN: -65; -75; -85; -95; 95+

Categories of KUMITE women

  • 2015-2016: -20; -25; -30; -35; 35+
  • 2013-2014: -25; -30; -35; -40; 40+
  • 2011-2012: -30; -35; -40; -45; 45+
  • 2009-2010: -35; -40; -45; -50; 50+
  • 2007-2008: -40; -45; -50; -55; 55+
  • 2005-2006: -45; -50; -55; -60; 60+
    • WOMEN: -50; -55; -60; -65; 65+

Conducting matches and duration of matches.

    Section "KUMITE" ADULTS
  • Scheme of qualifying matches: 2 min., 2 min., weigh-in, 2 min.
  • Schedule of matches, starting with the semi-finals: 3 min., 2 min., 2 min., weigh-in, 2 min.
    Section "KUMITE" JUNIORS (2005-2006)
  • Scheme of qualifying matches: 2 min., 2 min., weigh-in, 2 min.
  • Schedule of matches, starting with the semi-finals: 2 min., 2 min., 2 min., weigh-in, 2 min.
    Section "KUMITE" YOUNG PEOPLE (2007-2008)
  • Scheme of qualifying matches: 1 min 30 sec., 1 min 30 sec., weighing, 1 min 30 sec.
    Section "KUMITE" YOUNG BOYS (2009-2016)
  • Scheme of qualifying matches: 1 min., 1 min., weigh-in, 1 min.

Rewarding

Participants who won prizes in weight categories are awarded diplomas, medals and cups of the corresponding degrees
champ.address: Track and field arena, Kyiv, str. Pavla Tychyna, 18
